venue.name: Peter's Park - Joe Wex Dog Run

item.description:
Hi everyone, get ready for a SUNDAY meetup at Peters Park...if it's not too hot!

Meetup dues are $3 per frenchie...this covers the $12 monthly fee to host our meetup.com group online. Anything received in excess of the $12 will be donated to the French Bulldog Rescue Network in the group's name. :)

Then after your frenchie is done playing, head on over to the SoWa Open Market, just around the corner. Frenchies are VERY welcome at this outdoor craft & farmers market. In fact, Nino's mom will be there with her Bonjour Nino line of jewelry.

If your frenchie's not too tired, you can head over to walk the Freedom Trail or find another event to attend during Boston's Harborfest. 

Thanks so much, we can't wait to see you! Letitia & Clyde

PS - parking on Sundays is free!
item.how_to_find_us: Join us in the small enclosure.

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: Red White & Blue July French Bulldog Meetup
